TITLE: Installing Oban Met as a Dependency in Elixir
DESCRIPTION: Adds Oban Met as a dependency in a mix.exs file, specifying version 1.0 or compatible versions. This is necessary for worker nodes in hybrid environments with separate web and worker applications.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oban-bg/oban_met/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: elixir
CODE:
```
{:oban_met, "~> 1.0"}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting Oban Met Through Oban Plugins
DESCRIPTION: Configures Oban to start Oban Met as a plugin within the Oban supervision tree. This is used after disabling auto-start to explicitly control Met initialization.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oban-bg/oban_met/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: elixir
CODE:
```
plugins: [
  Oban.Met,
  ...
]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Implementing Oban Met Migration in Elixir
DESCRIPTION: Creates an Ecto migration that delegates to Oban.Met.Migration for creating and dropping database functions. This provides explicit control over database changes rather than relying on automatic migrations.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oban-bg/oban_met/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: elixir
CODE:
```
defmodule MyApp.Repo.Migrations.AddObanMet do
  use Ecto.Migration

  def up, do: Oban.Met.Migration.up()
  def down, do: Oban.Met.Migration.down()
end
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Oban Met Auto Start Behavior
DESCRIPTION: Disables the automatic starting of Oban Met through application configuration in a config.exs file. This allows for more explicit control over when and how Met instances start.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oban-bg/oban_met/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: elixir
CODE:
```
config :oban_met, auto_start: false
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Disabling Oban Met Auto-Migration
DESCRIPTION: Configures Oban Met to disable automatic database migrations when using explicit migrations. This prevents duplicate migration attempts when migrations are handled manually.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oban-bg/oban_met/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: elixir
CODE:
```
{Oban.Met, reporter: [auto_migrate: false]}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Generating Ecto Migration for Oban Met
DESCRIPTION: Mix command to generate a migration file for Oban Met. This creates necessary database structures when explicit control over migrations is required.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oban-bg/oban_met/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
mix ecto.gen.migration add_oban_met
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Customizing Oban Met Estimate Limits
DESCRIPTION: Configures the estimate_limit parameter for Oban Met to 200,000 records. This determines when Met switches from accurate counting to more efficient estimate functions for large job tables.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oban-bg/oban_met/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: elixir
CODE:
```
{Oban.Met, reporter: [estimate_limit: 200_000]}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Up Test Databases for Oban Met
DESCRIPTION: Mix command for setting up test databases when contributing to Oban Met. This prepares the PostgreSQL environment for running the test suite.
SOURCE: https://github.com/oban-bg/oban_met/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
mix test.setup
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Postgres Error Message for Empty List Query
DESCRIPTION: Example error message that occurs when querying with empty lists in Postgres database operations with Oban Met
SOURCE: https://github.com/oban-bg/oban_met/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sql
CODE:
```
(Postgrex.Error) ERROR 42809 (wrong_object_type) op ANY/ALL (array)
```
